ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] SPOILER!!! New Instrument found!
ygData.msgSnippet: Go to Allakhazam s site and he has the information on the Rare Coins Quest. It is given in Firiona Vie. Spoiler at this URL for all quests so be careful not to
ygData.messageBody:
Go to Allakhazam's site and he has the information on the Rare Coins Quest.
It is given in Firiona Vie.

Spoiler at this URL for all quests so be careful not to go to the quest
section if dont want the spoilers

http://everquest.allakhazam.com/
-----Original Message-----
From: Moss [mailto:Olmoss@...]
Sent: Saturday, May 20, 2000 5:19 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] SPOILER!!! New Instrument found!


This is so new that the Quest isn't listed on any of the sites and
only mentioned under the Drums section of Instruments at the Concert
Hall.
Where to get some information on the Rare Coin Quest ..anyone know ?
